tags.name: rc-icon
tags.description: Loads an icon asynchronously, caching the result for future uses

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: The name of the icon, this is relative to the assets folder of the system

attributes.name: path
attributes.description: The full path of the icon, this will only be used if `name` isn't provided or fails to fetch.

attributes.name: var:size
attributes.description: The size of the icon, must be a valid CSS unit

attributes.name: var:fill
attributes.description: The fill of the icon, must be a valid CSS colour

attributes.name: var:stroke
attributes.description: The stroke colour of the icon, must be a valid CSS colour

attributes.name: var:stroke-width
attributes.description: The stroke width of the icon, must be a valid CSS unit

attributes.name: var:stroke-linejoin
attributes.description: The stroke linejoin of the icon, must be a valid CSS value

tags.name: rc-border
tags.description: Creates a stylized border in the same sort of design that the published RipCrypt book uses

attributes.name: var:vertical-displacement
attributes.description: How much vertical displacement the title receives, defaults to 12.5px

attributes.name: var:padding
attributes.description: How much padding the border container has

attributes.name: var:border-color
attributes.description: The CSS value that is used as the colour of the border

attributes.name: var:padding-top
attributes.description: How much padding the top of the border element has, if not provided, defaults to the value of vertical displacement plus 4px

attributes.name: var:margin-top
attributes.description: How much margin the top of the border element has, if not provided, defaults to the value of vertical displacement

attributes.name: var:border-mask
attributes.description: The CSS colour used to mask out the border element, if not provided defaults to the --base-background CSS variable

attributes.name: var:title-height
attributes.description: The CSS height for the title, defaults to 20px

attributes.name: var:title-background
attributes.description: The CSS colour to make the title element, defaults to var:border-color
